io.scanbot.sdk.ui.view.barcode

Interface IBarcodeCameraView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StatelessView<State>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarcodeCameraView

    public IBarcodeCameraView
extends StatelessView<State>

    Represents camera screen for barcodes scanning

                 io.scanbot.sdk.ui.view.barcode.IBarcodeCameraView.Listener listener)

        void setAcceptedDocumentFormats(@NotNull
                                java.util.List<? extends io.scanbot.sdk.barcode.entity.BarcodeDocumentFormat> formats)

        Sets list of enum BarcodeDocumentFormat to scan

        Parameters:
        formats - accepted document formats
        See Also:
        enum BarcodeDocumentFormat

      • setDetectorType

        void setDetectorType(@NotNull
                     BarcodeDetectorType type)

        Allows to set custom detector type for the barcode detection BarcodeDetectorType.ML_BASED is used by default and uses ML mechanisms to detect the barcode on the frame or BarcodeDetectorType.PLAIN if it is needed to scan just one QR code or PDF-417 which is clearly visible it might work much faster

        Parameters:
        type - of the detector to use

      • setBarcodeDetector

        void setBarcodeDetector(@NotNull
                        ScanbotBarcodeDetector scanbotBarcodeDetector)

        Set interface ScanbotBarcodeDetector that performs detection and recognition

        See Also:
        interface ScanbotBarcodeDetector

      • setMinimumTextLength

        void setMinimumTextLength(int minimumTextLength)

        Set minimum required text length of the detected barcode. The default is 0 (setting is turned off). NOTE: Currently works for ITF barcodes only!

      • setMaximumTextLength

        void setMaximumTextLength(int maximumTextLength)

        Set maximum text length of the detected barcode. Setting to zero removes the limit. The default is 0 (setting is turned off). NOTE: Currently works for ITF barcodes only!

      • setMinimum1DQuietZoneSize

        void setMinimum1DQuietZoneSize(int minimum1DQuietZoneSize)

        Set minimum required quiet zone on the barcode. Measured in modules (the size of minimal bar on the barcode). The default is 10. NOTE: Currently works for ITF barcodes only!
